SELECT CASE t1.SMELL_REGISTER_TIME WHEN '001' THEN '001' WHEN '002' THEN '001' WHEN '003' THEN '001' WHEN '004' THEN '001' ELSE '002' END CODE_RESULT , t1.*
FROM ( SELECT any_value(SMELL_REGISTER_TIME) SMELL_REGISTER_TIME , MAX(REG_DT) REG_DT FROM tb_smell_register
WHERE 1 = 1
AND SMELL_REGISTER_TIME IN ('001','002','003','004') AND REG_ID = #{regId}
AND REG_DT > DATE_FORMAT(concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_DT < DATE_FORMAT(concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY REG_ID, SMELL_REGISTER_TIME ) t1
